thread.section_title: Legend Hotel by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: We would return!
thread.title_full: We would return! - Review of Legend Hotel by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anna D
title: We would return!
text: We enjoyed our stay. The desk staff is friendly and the breakfast had a spread filled with delicious meats, cheeses, pastry, eggs and fruit for all. The courtesy bar comes in handy when you just want a little sinething. The hotel is in a perfect location where you can travel into or away frim Paris. There is shopping in every direction and cafes and cinemas are closeby.
